NobleWarrior:AggressiveGuard.NAME: Aggressive Guard
NobleWarrior:AggressiveGuard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

NobleWarrior:Ambidexterity.NAME: Ambidexterity
NobleWarrior:Ambidexterity.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 Throwing Knife and 1 Throwing Shuriken into your hand.
NobleWarrior:Ambidexterity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 1 upgraded Throwing Knife and 1 upgraded Throwing Shuriken into your hand.

NobleWarrior:ArmUp.NAME: Arm Up
NobleWarrior:ArmUp.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your discard pile. NL Choose a card in your discard pile and create a copy of it in your deck.
NobleWarrior:ArmUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your discard pile. NL Choose a card in your discard pile and create a copy of it in your deck. NL Retain.

NobleWarrior:BodyLanguage.NAME: Body Language
NobleWarrior:BodyLanguage.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card then Exhaust 1 card.
NobleWarrior:BodyLanguage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 card then Exhaust 1 card.

NobleWarrior:BombToss.NAME: Bomb Toss
NobleWarrior:BombToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! Throwing Bombs into your hand.
NobleWarrior:BombToss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! upgraded Throwing Bombs into your hand.

NobleWarrior:BraveUp.NAME: Brave Up
NobleWarrior:BraveUp.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. Gain !M! Strength for each card exhausted.
NobleWarrior:BraveUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. Gain !M! Strength and !B! Block for each card exhausted.

NobleWarrior:Brawler.NAME: Brawler
NobleWarrior:Brawler.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw 1 card if there are no Skills in your hand.

NobleWarrior:CalculatedStrike.NAME: Calculated Strike
NobleWarrior:CalculatedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Retain !M! card this turn.

NobleWarrior:CallUponTheEarth.NAME: Call Upon the Earth
NobleWarrior:CallUponTheEarth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain [E] if you played !M! or more cards already this turn.

NobleWarrior:CastleOfStone.NAME: Castle of Stone
NobleWarrior:CastleOfStone.DESCRIPTION: If 3 or more enemies intend to attack, gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.
NobleWarrior:CastleOfStone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If 3 or more enemies intend to attack, gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.

NobleWarrior:Catch.NAME: Catch
NobleWarrior:Catch.DESCRIPTION: Nullify the next enemy attack and return the same amount of damage to the enemy. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
NobleWarrior:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be played the same turn you play an Attack. NL Gain !M! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have played an Attack this turn.

NobleWarrior:CombatTraining.NAME: Combat Training
NobleWarrior:CombatTraining.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 3 Attacks in a row, gain !M! Strength.

NobleWarrior:Counter.NAME: Counter
NobleWarrior:Counter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns for each enemy that intends to attack.

NobleWarrior:CounterGeo.NAME: Counter Geo
NobleWarrior:CounterGeo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy attacks you, apply 1 random debuff to it.

NobleWarrior:DesperateDefense.NAME: Desperate Defense
NobleWarrior:DesperateDefense.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play an Attack each turn, play a random Skill from your draw pile.

NobleWarrior:Disillusion.NAME: Disillusion
NobleWarrior:Disillusion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! cards. Those cards are Retained this turn.

NobleWarrior:DrawOutAme-no-Murakumo.NAME: Draw Out Ame-no-Murakumo
NobleWarrior:DrawOutAme-no-Murakumo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP. NL Shuffle an Ame-no-Murakumo into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
NobleWarrior:DrawOutAme-no-Murakumo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP. NL Shuffle an upgraded Ame-no-Murakumo into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:DrawOutAsuraKnife.NAME: Draw Out Asura Knife
NobleWarrior:DrawOutAsuraKnife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL Shuffle an Asura Knife into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
NobleWarrior:DrawOutAsuraKnife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL Shuffle an upgraded Asura Knife into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:DrawOutChirijiraden.NAME: Draw Out Chirijiraden
NobleWarrior:DrawOutChirijiraden.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle a Burn and a Chirijiraden into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
NobleWarrior:DrawOutChirijiraden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle a Burn and an upgraded Chirijiraden into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:DrawOutKiyomori.NAME: Draw Out Kiyomori
NobleWarrior:DrawOutKiyomori.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain [E] at the start of your next turn. NL Shuffle a Kiyomori into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
NobleWarrior:DrawOutKiyomori.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain [E] at the start of your next turn. NL Shuffle an upgraded Kiyomori into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:DrawOutKoutetsu.NAME: Draw Out Koutetsu
NobleWarrior:DrawOutKoutetsu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a Wound and a Koutetsu into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
NobleWarrior:DrawOutKoutetsu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a Wound and an upgraded Koutetsu into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:DrawOutMasamune.NAME: Draw Out Masamune
NobleWarrior:DrawOutMasamune.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle a Masamune into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
NobleWarrior:DrawOutMasamune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle an upgraded Masamune into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:DrawOutMuramasa.NAME: Draw Out Muramasa
NobleWarrior:DrawOutMuramasa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. The enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Shuffle a Muramasa into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
NobleWarrior:DrawOutMuramasa.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. The enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Shuffle an upgraded Muramasa into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:DrawOutMurasame.NAME: Draw Out Murasame
NobleWarrior:DrawOutMurasame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a Murasame into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
NobleWarrior:DrawOutMurasame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an upgraded Murasame into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:EarthSlash.NAME: Earth Slash
NobleWarrior:EarthSlash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

NobleWarrior:EquipArmor.NAME: Equip Armor
NobleWarrior:EquipArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Then, if you have 20 or more Block, lose !M! Block and gain !M! Metallicize.

NobleWarrior:EvasiveJump.NAME: Evasive Jump
NobleWarrior:EvasiveJump.DESCRIPTION: Enemies deal no attack damage to you this turn. You cannot play Attacks the rest of this turn. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:FanDance.NAME: Fan Dance
NobleWarrior:FanDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Draw a card each time this card deals unblocked damage.

NobleWarrior:Fly.NAME: Fly
NobleWarrior:Fly.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the attack damage you receive this turn by 50%. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:ForbiddenWaltz.NAME: Forbidden Waltz
NobleWarrior:ForbiddenWaltz.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Immobilize, Toad, Confuse, Blind, and Slow to ALL enemies.

NobleWarrior:Fury.NAME: Fury
NobleWarrior:Fury.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block whenever you play an Attack.

NobleWarrior:GainHeight.NAME: Gain Height
NobleWarrior:GainHeight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength X times. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:GearUp.NAME: Gear Up
NobleWarrior:GearUp.DESCRIPTION: Put a random card of cost 0, cost 1, and cost 2 from your draw pile into your hand.
NobleWarrior:GearUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a random card of cost 0, cost 1, and cost 2 from your draw pile into your hand. NL Retain.

NobleWarrior:GilSnapper.NAME: Gil Snapper
NobleWarrior:GilSnapper.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive unblocked damage, gain that amount of Gold.

NobleWarrior:Hamedo.NAME: Hamedo
NobleWarrior:Hamedo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to each enemy planning to attack. Gain !M! Buffer.

NobleWarrior:JavelinThrow.NAME: Javelin Throw
NobleWarrior:JavelinThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add 1 Throwing Spear into your hand.
NobleWarrior:JavelinThrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add 1 upgraded Throwing Spear into your hand.

NobleWarrior:Kamaitachi.NAME: Kamaitachi
NobleWarrior:Kamaitachi.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

NobleWarrior:LawOfTheLand.NAME: Law of the Land
NobleWarrior:LawOfTheLand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! cards, then Exhaust a card from your hand.

NobleWarrior:MindBreak.NAME: Mind Break
NobleWarrior:MindBreak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If an enemy intends to inflict a debuff, gain 1 Artifact.

NobleWarrior:MountingFury.NAME: Mounting Fury
NobleWarrior:MountingFury.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, then increase this damage by !M!.

NobleWarrior:Muzan.NAME: Muzan
NobleWarrior:Muzan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each 0-cost card in your hand.

NobleWarrior:ObserveBattle.NAME: Observe Battle
NobleWarrior:ObserveBattle.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Gain !M! Strength until end of turn.

NobleWarrior:PiercingShot.NAME: Piercing Shot
NobleWarrior:PiercingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

NobleWarrior:Pitfall.NAME: Pitfall
NobleWarrior:Pitfall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Remove all Block from enemy and apply !M! Immobilize.

NobleWarrior:PolearmGuard.NAME: Polearm Guard
NobleWarrior:PolearmGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you played another card this turn, draw !M! cards.

NobleWarrior:Polka.NAME: Polka
NobleWarrior:Polka.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
NobleWarrior:Polka.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Innate.

NobleWarrior:RainOfArrows.NAME: Rain of Arrows
NobleWarrior:RainOfArrows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each Attack played this turn.

NobleWarrior:Reflexes.NAME: Reflexes
NobleWarrior:Reflexes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add 1 random Throwing weapon into your hand.
NobleWarrior:Reflexes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add 1 random upgraded Throwing weapon into your hand.

NobleWarrior:RepeatingFist.NAME: Repeating Fist
NobleWarrior:RepeatingFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times, then increase the number of hits by 1 this combat.

NobleWarrior:ReverseFlourish.NAME: Reverse Flourish
NobleWarrior:ReverseFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you play an Attack while this is in hand, increase the damage of this card by !M! this combat.

NobleWarrior:Salve.NAME: Salve
NobleWarrior:Salve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all debuffs. NL Retain. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:ScatterTheAshes.NAME: Scatter the Ashes
NobleWarrior:ScatterTheAshes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card exhausts, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

NobleWarrior:SeekCover.NAME: Seek Cover
NobleWarrior:SeekCover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Dexterity, then if you have 3 or more Dexterity, Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:ShieldBreak.NAME: Shield Break
NobleWarrior:ShieldBreak.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy and deal !D! damage. It can't gain Block for !M! turns.

NobleWarrior:Sift.NAME: Sift
NobleWarrior:Sift.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

NobleWarrior:SleightOfHand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
NobleWarrior:SleightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Choose 1 of 3 random cards and add it to your hand.
NobleWarrior:SleightOfHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Choose 1 of 3 random cards and add it to your hand. NL Retain.

NobleWarrior:SlowDance.NAME: Slow Dance
NobleWarrior:SlowDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply Slow to ALL enemies.

NobleWarrior:SpeedBreak.NAME: Speed Break
NobleWarrior:SpeedBreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

NobleWarrior:SpinFist.NAME: Spin Fist
NobleWarrior:SpinFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Return 1 card at random from your discard pile to your hand.
NobleWarrior:SpinFist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Return 1 card of your choice from your discard pile to your hand.

NobleWarrior:StealArmor.NAME: Steal Armor
NobleWarrior:StealArmor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you can Steal, apply !M! Vulnerable and gain !M! Dexterity. NL Apply 1 Stolen.

NobleWarrior:StealEnergy.NAME: Steal Energy
NobleWarrior:StealEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you can Steal, gain [E]. NL Apply 1 Stolen.
NobleWarrior:StealEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you can Steal, gain [E][E]. NL Apply 1 Stolen.

NobleWarrior:StealExp.NAME: Steal Exp
NobleWarrior:StealExp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you can Steal, choose 1 of 3 cards to add to your deck permanently. NL Apply 1 Stolen. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:StealGil.NAME: Steal Gil
NobleWarrior:StealGil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you can Steal, gain Gold equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Apply 1 Stolen.

NobleWarrior:StealHeart.NAME: Steal Heart
NobleWarrior:StealHeart.DESCRIPTION: If you can Steal, apply !M! Charmed. NL Apply 1 Stolen. NL Exhaust.

NobleWarrior:StealWeapon.NAME: Steal Weapon
NobleWarrior:StealWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you can Steal, enemy loses !M! Strength and you gain !M! Strength. NL Apply 1 Stolen.

NobleWarrior:SunkenState.NAME: Sunken State
NobleWarrior:SunkenState.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 0-cost card, draw 1 card and gain !M! Block.

NobleWarrior:SuperJump.NAME: Super Jump
NobleWarrior:SuperJump.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies next turn.

NobleWarrior:SwiftShot.NAME: Swift Shot
NobleWarrior:SwiftShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E].

NobleWarrior:TacticalRetreat.NAME: Tactical Retreat
NobleWarrior:TacticalRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw 1 card for each enemy in combat.

NobleWarrior:ThrowStone.NAME: Throw Stone
NobleWarrior:ThrowStone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the lowest health.

NobleWarrior:UnlimitedArsenal.NAME: Unlimited Arsenal
NobleWarrior:UnlimitedArsenal.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 random Throwing weapon into your hand.
NobleWarrior:UnlimitedArsenal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 random upgraded Throwing weapon into your hand.

NobleWarrior:WalkOnWater.NAME: Walk on Water
NobleWarrior:WalkOnWater.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity at random.

NobleWarrior:WaterMovement.NAME: Water Movement
NobleWarrior:WaterMovement.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you create a card, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

NobleWarrior:WaveFist.NAME: Wave Fist
NobleWarrior:WaveFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 1 time for each enemy in combat.

NobleWarrior:WeaponBreak.NAME: Weapon Break
NobleWarrior:WeaponBreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

NobleWarrior:WeaponGuard.NAME: Weapon Guard
NobleWarrior:WeaponGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

NobleWarrior:WhirlingDefense.NAME: Whirling Defense
NobleWarrior:WhirlingDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

NobleWarrior:WildShot.NAME: Wild Shot
NobleWarrior:WildShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice.

NobleWarrior:WithKnives.NAME: With Knives
NobleWarrior:WithKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle up to !M! cards from your discard pile into your draw pile.
